ygData.subject: Re: Running job order.xml from commandline with our WebUI.
ygData.msgSnippet: did you try running from the heritrix install dir (not the bin dir)... %HERITRIX_HOME% bin foreground_heritrix --admin admin:admin tmp order.xml works for me.

did you try running from the heritrix install dir (not the bin dir)...

%HE=
RITRIX_HOME%\bin\foreground_heritrix --admin admin:admin \tmp\order.xml

wo=
rks for me.
